entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dominion City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
